name: Lovelator (April's Fool 2020)
description:
Three couples are... let's say... in love with each other. But each pair lacks the courage to confess their love for the other. Luckily, that fateful day, they ride the same elevator, and boy is it slow.

But it's also the perfect chance to slip that love confession once and for all and tie the proverbial knot! Careful, though, you only got 69 floors to make this work!

Which couple will find true love? Which will fail terribly? It's up to you to decide!

  • Brahmi - The secret love interest;
  • Blake Hussey - Composed the lovey-dovey melody;
  • Benjamin Kleman (Twitter) -  Made the love lines sound cheesy!;
  • Dave Zhang - Drew the hot hunks!;
  • Edwyn Tiong (Twitter) - Made the pervy noise for the hentai CGs;
  • HarukaNami - Filled the game with hearts <3;
  • Josh Choong (aka Shad) - The great mind behind this game;
  • kohkii (Twitter) - Drew the pervy CGs!;
  • Kowara - Was against all of this;
  • Larry Jones - Made the marriage song!;
  • Maria_Prism - Drew the hot ladies!;
  • WudgeyDev - Coded the love points <3;
  • YoruUta - Lazy ass, did nothing;

---

Voice acting (by order of appearance):

  • Chintarmanya Vivian - Voiced the female rival LI that never got in the elevator... Too bad!
  • MikeYoungVO - Voiced the male rival LI that never got in the elevator... Too bad!
  • Jordan Bonn - Voiced the hot guy with the hots for the hot gal;
  • Katie Otten -  Voiced the hot gal with the hots for the hot guy;
  • Red Aller - Voiced the older woman in love with the older guy;
  • Christina Costello - Voiced the only sane person in this game;
  • Nathalie Ferare - Voiced the babe with the hots for the sexiest man alive;
  • Juwan Royal - Voiced the older man in love with the older woman;
  • Nick Anne - Voiced the sexiest man alive;
